name: Bottom Fisher
description:
Join Guppy and the quest to catch all the fishes at the bottom of this sea! The big fishes are the enemy. How fast can you avoid them? Let's go!
- No In App Purchases, No Micro Transactions, No internet connection needed to play.
- Unlimited Play Time
- Small File Size
- That sound effect took me out. LMAO

Enjoy!

https://www.facebook.com/getemilio
